Title: Provides for establishment of school speed limits by county legislative body
Summary: Provides for the establishment of school speed limits of not less than fifteen miles per hour by the legislative body of any county or, if so delegated, by the legislative body of any locality within said county on a portion of a state highway, county or town road passing a school building.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to school speed limits
